    • generateCoordinates

      public int[] generateCoordinates​(int boundary)
      Generates a set of random coordinates within grid size boundaries. Also does proper checks if those random coordinates point to an occupied cell. And if so it generates different ones.
      Parameters:
      boundary - the number to generate up to

    • generateEntities

      public void generateEntities()
      Method that generates entities in random free cells.

    • resetRoom

      public void resetRoom()
      Repositions current entities to random free cells.

    • addNewEntity

      public void addNewEntity​(Entity e, int x, int y)
      Method that adds a new entity in the entities list at a specific position. PRE: position (x, y) must be empty
      Parameters:
      e - the entity
      x - column 0 <= x <= 9
      y - row 0 <= y <= 9

    • clearRoom

      public void clearRoom()
      Empties the list of entities (Deletes all entities)

      y - row 0 <= y <= 9

      public java.lang.String displayEntity​(int x, int y)

      y - row 0 <= y <= 9

    • save

      public void save​(java.lang.String file) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Saves the state of the game to a file called "lor.txt". Save File Format: {type} {name} {health} {x} {y} {special attributes} Special attributes refer to wisdom, age, etc.
      Specified by:
      save in interface Storage
      Parameters:
      file - file name
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
